name: spidertrontiers
title: Spidertron Tiers
author: Zangeti
description: Creates different Spidertron Tiers. Now there are Mk2 and Mk3 Spidertrons, which improve upon Mk1 through increased fire-rate, increased leg stretch length, larger equipment grids and inventory size and increased health! Check out the linked Discord if you have questions, bugs or feature requests!
